short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For importing Bridge Club Live to BriAn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This application is designed for contract bridge clubs who are using the Bridge Club Live platform to run online bridge events during lockdown, but who wish to publish their results on their usual platform which they use for face-to-face events.

BCL-2-Brian is a download assistant designed to extract the Bridge Club Live web page for each deal played in the match. These downloaded files can then be imported into the BriAn scoring system, from which they can be published to a variety of third-party platforms:
 - BridgeWebs
 - Pianola
 - BridgeCloud

It is also possible to amend results within the BriAn system after the game is completed.

For full instructions on this and the related our related Chrome extension for downloading from the BBO platform, please use the contact details available at our homepage.

Feedback and suggestions welcome.
